mapper.select: SELECT o.orderno, o.memberno, o.total, o.payment, o.rdate, o.order_state, p.title, p.thumb1, oi.cnt, oi.saleprice, o.status FROM orders o JOIN order_item oi ON o.orderno = oi.orderno JOIN products p ON oi.productsno = p.productsno WHERE o.memberno = #{memberno} AND oi.order_itemno = ( SELECT MIN(oi2.order_itemno) FROM order_item oi2 WHERE oi2.orderno = o.orderno ) ORDER BY o.orderno DESC
SELECT * FROM orders ORDER BY orderno DESC
SELECT DISTINCT o.* FROM orders o JOIN order_item oi ON o.orderno = oi.orderno JOIN products p ON oi.productsno = p.productsno WHERE p.memberno = #{memberno} ORDER BY o.orderno DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders WHERE memberno = #{memberno}
